pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PhysioNetA collection of tools for working with the [PhysioNet](http://physionet.org/) repository.## Installation```bashpip install physionet```## Usage```pythonimport physionet as pn# Download a datasetpn.download('ptbdb', 'data/ptbdb')# List all datasetspn.list_datasets()```
